EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_GOTO Amsterdam_Q218.Post Event Email GOTO Amsterdam
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at GOTO Amsterdam 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thanks for joining Pivotal at GOTO Amsterdam. We hope you enjoyed learning how enterprises are adopting cloud-native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. If you’d like to arrange a hands on workshop day in your offices or at a nearby hotel, simply inquire here <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]> to begin a discussion.
Need some dev/test or CI environments? Try running Spring Boot on our public Cloud Foundry instance, Pivotal Web Services <[[http://run.pivotal.io/spring?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>, a platform engineered for Spring Boot.
In the meantime, start your Cloud-Native Journey <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]> and learn about underlying concepts <[[https://pivotal.io/topics?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>, why it matters, what it looks like and how to become cloud-native. Download and read free chapters of Cloud-Native Java <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>, by Josh Long and Kenny Bastani.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- Full-stack Reactive Java with Project Reactor & Spring Boot 2 <[[https://gotoams.nl/2018/sessions/417]]>
Click here <[[https://content.pivotal.io/goto-amsterdam-2018?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]> for the latest in Spring, Pivotal and Cloud Foundry.
Stay in touch with the Spring Team and join the conversation on our blogs <[[http://spring.io/blog?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>, podcasts <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>, and on Twitter <[[https://twitter.com/Pivotal]]>. We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]>!
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
P.S. It's time to level-up. Join your peers at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-goto-amsterdam-q218]]> and pick up new skills and ideas to build better software, faster. Use the discount code Attendee_Event_100 to get $100 off the posted price.
